department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: The goal of this course is to help students understand the core concept of cloud service security, including implementation, deployment, operating, regulatory, and security issues.
goal.ch: 1. 強調雲端服務的安全觀念與實作 2. 深入探討雲端服務的合法與合規議題 3. 雲端服務相關的資安議題議題探討

content.en:
This course will cover the following topics:
Cloud Service Security Overview, Cloud Data, Cloud Application Security, Cloud Platform Management and Security Concerns, Data Center and Cloud Operations, and Cloud Regulations and Laws.
content.ch:
This course will cover the following topics:
Cloud Service Security Overview, Cloud Data, Cloud Application Security, Cloud Platform Management and Security Concerns, Data Center and Cloud Operations, and Cloud Regulations and Laws.

grading.en: Exam: 40％, HW: 40％, Lab and Class Participation: 20％
